hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Sa'eed said:"Prices rose at the time of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), and they said: 'Why do you not fix the food prices, O Messenger of Allah?' He said: 'I hope that when I leave you, no one among you will be demanding restitution for a wrong that I have done to him

chapter.eng-name: Whoever Does Not Like To Fix Prices
